text:
THE FLORIDA STATE UNIVERSITY
TALLAHASSEE
IIVERSITY BROADCASTING SERVICES
August 18, I960
Dr. Harry J. Skornia
President, National Association
of Educational Broadcasters
lh Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Under revelant comments on the attached questionnaire I
have indicated that I think your suggestion of keeping
track of time spent away from your NAEB desk from mid-
September to November is ridiculous.
Matter of fact, it verges on scrupulosity. So what if
there is six weeks of over-lapping salary? Your service
to us during these 6 weeks — whether under the NAEB
banner or not — will be as critical as any service you
have ever performed. To make too much of issues such as
this smacks of pique. "This is my minute, this is your
minute. Here we draw the line, Fere are the sums, now I
dare anybody to say I owe anybody anything.”
I know you don*t feel that way, but it*s an impression
I could get.
Best regards.
Director
EF/as
